title: the following order, with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (4) of that
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Section 9(2)) (Amount of Financial Contribution) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 December 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (section 9(2)) (amount financial contribution) order 2022 (2) order shall come operation 1 december 2022

title: the following order, with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (4) of that
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Civil Law (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Civil Law (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022).

title: the following order, with respect to which, pursuant to subsection (4) of that
heading: 3. The amount of €800 is specified for the purposes of section 9(1)(b) of
text_raw:
3. The amount of €800 is specified for the purposes of section 9(1)(b) of 

the Act of 2022. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [687] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth.
